name: Color Cluster!
description:
Let’s unlock all the hidden animals!

Each animal will be covered by a lot of balls with different colors.
You need to tap on the cluster where you want to change the color and keep doing that with a smart strategy,
untill all of the balls have one same color.
That’s the time a rainbow ball appears. By using it you can break the shell and reveal the animal inside.

Be smart using your Coloring Power

And let’s see how many animal can you get.
